PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-04662021-06-01,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HC
ActPatent Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Patented Medicines Regulations and the Regulations Amending the Patented Medicines Regulations (Additional Factors and Information Reporting Requirements)
PrecisRegulations amending the PATENTED MEDICINES REGULATIONS AND the Regulations Amending the PATENTED MEDICINES REGULATIONS (ADDITIONAL FACTORS AND INFORMATION REPORTING REQUIREMENTS) in order to require that holders of Certificates of Supplementary Protection's report information to the Patented Medicine Prices Review Board on the same terms and conditions as would be reported by patentees.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0116 Publication Date: 2021-06-09
AttachmentsAttachment
